CustomField.description: Indicates that the End Date of the Pay Calendar Period on the Payee Pay Batch is greater than the End Date of the Pay Calendar Period on the related Pay Batch
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the End Date of the Pay Calendar Period on the Payee Pay Batch is greater than the End Date of the Pay Calendar Period on the related Pay Batch
CustomField.label: Flag Future Pay Calendar Period
